mapper.select: select max(dayId)+1 from StockPurReceipt where createTime >= #{today}
mapper.insert: insert into StockPurReceipt(dayId, operatorId, createTime, lastModifiedTime, receiptState, memberId, stockName, goodsList, originSum, comment) values(#{dayId}, #{operatorId}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{receiptState}, #{memberId}, #{stockName}, #{goodsList, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler}, #{originSum}, #{comment})
mapper.update: update StockPurReceipt set lastModifiedTime=#{lastModifiedTime}, receiptState=#{receiptState}, memberId=#{memberId}, stockName=#{stockName}, goodsList=#{goodsList, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler}, discountAmount=#{discountAmount}, tokenAmount=#{tokenAmount}, originSum=#{originSum}, comment=#{comment}} where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.delete: delete from StockPurReceipt where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
mapper.select: select * from StockPurReceipt where createTime >= #{begin} and createTime <= #{end}
